name: Heeey! Park-Boy!
description:
Summary

"Heeey! Park-Boy!" is a simple game I made about watering flowers, spreading joy and rebuilding things that were once broken.

It was heavily inspired by the games like "Chibi-Robo: Park Patrol" and "Katamari Damacy" - two of my favourite games.

Story

In the game, you play as Yuu-Boy - an alien that has crash-landed in an old city park.

His ship ran out of fuel (which of course, is happiness) and now he is stuck.

You have no choice but to try and spread love as much as you can to try and get Yuu-Boy home!

You do this, at first, by watering flowers - but over time you unlock the ability to redecorate the park with items you buy.

Features

  • Water flowers and make them dance.
  • Buy and sell objects for your park and decorate it however you like.
  • Unlock tools and upgrades for Yuu-Boy.

I hope you enjoy my game!
